short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily calculate your monthly income tax based on the latest tax brackets for salaried persons in Pakistan (FBR).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pakistani Tax Calculator is a browser extension designed to assist Pakistani individuals in calculating their income tax liability. It offers a user-friendly interface that allows users to input their monthly salary and select the tax year to estimate their tax obligations accurately. The extension supports tax calculations for different tax years and provides the option to include medical exemption and tax calculations specific to teachers.
